name: Dot The Game
description:
Can you count to 4? Yes! So you should be able to play the original version of Dot.
Try to get into the top 10 of expert players who play 4x4 grids, but be careful if time is close to 100!

-Unlimited Levels.
-4 game modes: 2x2, 3x3, 4x4 and 4x4 Expert with limited time and spells!
